Text.Page:
You're definitely a cure for our centaur problem, but there's no cure for the idiocy of certain loggers. Like Siravon.

I sent him to repair the bridge south of Faevine Vale, and that idiot left without his tools!

I'd send one of my loggers, but the roads are dangerous...and you're here.

Care to bring Siravon the tools he should have had all along?

Thanks, . I swear, Balter has it out for me. Forgetting the tools was my fault, sure, but who sends an unarmed logger out here alone to fix a bridge?

A boss who has it out for me, that's who.
